markdownRemark.html:
I’m delighted to know you want to learn more about me.

I’m (primarily) a JavaScript Engineer equally competent on both the client & the server. Currently struggling to keep a love affair with Python secret. In my downtime, I create tools (like Adonis Authentication Scaffold) to increase development velocity and I’m really keen on software architecture so I created the Hexa framework to incorporate some really cool development ideas.

When I’m not coding (or reading the most fashionable conspiracy theories), I’m likely on some culinary experiment or struggling at Chess.

You can say hi on Twitter too @creatrixity
